feed.title: MidwestWeekends - Travel in Minnesota, Wisconsin, Illinois, Iowa
feed.subtitle: ... because life's too short to stay home

entry.title: Prize-hunting in Princeton
entry.content: In central Wisconsin, shoppers flock to a flea market like bees to clover.

entry.title: Pizza on the farm
entry.content: In Wisconsin and Minnesota, dinner guests flock to the country for ultra-fresh ingredients and idyllic settings.

entry.title: Golfing beyond Brainerd
entry.content: Ditch the familiar and try a new course in lakes country between Menahga and McGregor.

entry.title: Door County 101
entry.content: Want to check out this popular peninsula? Here's everything you need to plan a visit.

entry.title: Cheap fall getaways
entry.content: Here are 20 places to enjoy autumn colors without going into the red.

entry.title: Copper Harbor refuge
entry.content: Early fortune-seekers left their mark on a village at the tip of Michigan's Keweenaw Peninsula.

entry.title: Lake Superior's greatest hits
entry.content: With this nine-day itinerary, take in the highlights of the magnificent Circle Tour.

entry.title: The Lighthouse Express
entry.content: On Minnesota's North Shore, a vintage railroad takes passengers back to the past.

entry.title: Troll-hunting in Mount Horeb
entry.content: A little town near Madison wins friends with a mix of old and new attractions.

entry.title: A roof in the woods
entry.content: In state and county parks and forests around the Upper Midwest, visitors love their camper cabins.

entry.title: Dreaming of Ely
entry.content: The wilderness around this north-woods town exerts a magnetic pull on city folk.

entry.title: Adventure on the Gunflint Trail
entry.content: For outdoorsy folks, this wilderness in northeast Minnesota is a year-round playground.
